name: bibdesk-integration
description: Import BibTex citations into your notes and open PDF documents linked in a BibDesk library.

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.bookmark_resolver: swiftc -O -target arm64-apple-macosx11.0 -o dist/bookmark_resolver-arm64 bookmark_resolver/bookmark_resolver.swift && swiftc -O -target x86_64-apple-macosx11.0 -o dist/bookmark_resolver-x86_64 bookmark_resolver/bookmark_resolver.swift && lipo -create dist/bookmark_resolver-arm64 dist/bookmark_resolver-x86_64 -output dist/bookmark_resolver && rm dist/bookmark_resolver-arm64 dist/bookmark_resolver-x86_64 && codesign --sign 'Developer ID Application: Andrea Alberti (9V3X7C8VCK)' --options runtime dist/bookmark_resolver

author: Andrea Alberti
